de Pompadour, Madame.translation[0].defi: (1721–64) the mistress of King Louis XV of France. She had a lot of influence over politics from 1745 until her death.
de Pompadour, Madame.translation[1].defi: (1721–64) the lover of King Louis XV of France from 1745 until her death. She often influenced the king, especially when he had to choose government officials and make political decisions.
